conclusion: Objects A and B move through the air and come into contact with objects C, D, E, F due to gravity.
Object A is positioned above the round table.
Object B is positioned above the round table.
Object C is positioned on the table.
Object D is positioned on the table.
Object E is positioned on the table.
Object F is positioned on the table.
Object A will move downwards towards Object C.
Object B will move downwards towards Object D.
Object A will come into contact with Object C.
Object B will come into contact with Object D.
When Object A hits Object C, the cloth covering Object C will likely be displaced due to the force of the impact.
When Object B hits Object D, the cloth covering Object D will also be displaced.
After the impact, Object A and Object B will rest on top of Object C and Object D respectively.
The cloths will be displaced, revealing Objects C and D underneath.
Object A will fall on Object C, displacing the cloth covering Object C.
Object B will fall on Object D, displacing the cloth covering Object D.
